channel.title: Hybe America on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Hybe America on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Yoo Ji-tae, Tony Revolori and Gia Kim Join Paramount and Hybe America’s K-Pop Movie (Exclusive)
item.description: The newly announced cast join previously announced stars Ji-young Yoo and Eric Nam in the Benson Lee-directed film.

item.title: Yoo Ji-tae, Tony Revolori and Gia Kim Join Paramount and Hybe America’s K-Pop Movie (Exclusive)
item.description: The newly announced cast join previously announced stars Ji-young Yoo and Eric Nam in the Benson Lee-directed film.

item.title: Paramount and Hybe’s K-pop Movie Adds Ji-young Yoo and Eric Nam, Lands 2027 Release
item.description: Benson Lee will direct the film, which is expected to be the first major American studio film shot entirely in South Korea.

item.title: Paramount and Hybe’s K-pop Movie Adds Ji-young Yoo and Eric Nam, Lands 2027 Release
item.description: Benson Lee will direct the film, which is expected to be the first major American studio film shot entirely in South Korea.

item.title: Scooter Braun Calls ‘Swag’ the “Most Authentically Justin Bieber Album to Date”
item.description: The longtime manager and the superstar parted ways in 2023.
